description: Root Cause Remediation Policy (RCRP) Template structure. Used to automatically synthesize actionable remediation steps from DARM output when a P-R03 Integrity Halt occurs, ensuring autonomous system recovery.

fields.name: incident_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the Integrity Halt instance (matches FDLS Trace ID).

fields.name: trigger_mandate
fields.description: The P-Set mandate that was violated (e.g., P-M02).

fields.name: rca_mapping_key
fields.description: Key derived from DARM (DIAL Analysis Map) identifying the synthesized root cause profile.

fields.name: remediation_action_set
fields.description: Ordered sequence of machine-executable repair commands/API calls necessary to resolve the root cause.

fields.name: estimated_rollback_capability
fields.description: Flag indicating if deterministic rollback to the prior verified state is feasible/required before re-execution.

fields.name: aass_signoff_required
fields.description: If post-remediation re-signing by AASS is mandatory before DSE restart.
